modShortDescription: There are 3 styles of windows and 2 styles of the glass doors. Each has a centered and non centered version as well as downgrade blocks.
modDescription:
There are 3 styles of [windows](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-windows/) and 2 styles of the glass [doors](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-doors/). Each has a centered and non centered version as well as downgrade blocks.

**Demo:**

**[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/x0nst49ubg06jty/Opening_Windows.rar/file)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/24685-opening-windows-and-glass-doors/).

**Credits:** [Three08](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/three08/)
